column4: I just installed hardy on a box last night, and saw something odd.  If I drag a window too far to the left or right, it plops on another adjacent desktop.  I then tried it on my own xubuntu box, and the same thing happened.  Here at work though, on a regular ubuntu box, it doesn't work.  Where do I turn that feature on?
You need compiz and Desktop Effects enabled.
I don't have them running on my xubuntu box, that's what I thought was weird.
